title: Creamy Seafood Wraps with Courgette and Cucumber Salad
ingredients: ['4 spring onions, finely sliced', '4 large tomatoes, diced', '150g low-fat soft cheese with garlic and herbs', '250g ready-to-eat seafood mix, including mussels, prawns and squid', '4 large soft flour tortillas', '1 tbsp olive oil', '50g mature Cheddar cheese, grated', '2 small courgettes, thinly sliced', '1/2 cucumber, thinly sliced', '150g rocket', '1 lime', 'a little chilli oil']
